channel.title: Need some help with a varible

item.title: Need some help with a varible
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

Quote from: Lusfr on Today at 01:00:46 PM
Compileing Itzscape
client.java:8240: variable mute might not have been initialized
if (mute == 1) {

And i know it should work because i did that same thing for donator but this time it’s saying this.

==============================================================================

I have this in player.Java.

public int playerRights; public int mute; public int donator;

public Player(int _playerId) { playerId = _playerId; // playerName = "player"+playerId; playerRights = 0; // player rights donator = 0; //donator mute = 0; //muted

And this in client.Java

characterfile.write("character-rights = ", 0, 19); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(playerRights), 0, Integer.toString(playerRights).length()); characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-donator = ", 0, 20); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(donator), 0, Integer.toString(donator).length()); characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-mute = ", 0, 17); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(mute), 0, Integer.toString(mute).length()); characterfile.newLine();

else if (token.equals("character-rights")) { playerRights = Integer.parseInt(token2); } else if (token.equals("character-donator")) { donator = Integer.parseInt(token2); } else if (token.equals("character-mute")) { mute = Integer.parseInt(token2);

With the playerRights and donator codes work fine only the Mute one won’t work.

Read full topic
